scripts.configure:linux: touch ./.env && . ./.env && javac server/FileEnvironmentConfigurator.java && java server/FileEnvironmentConfigurator.java src/assets/environment.js #JSKEY# #JSVALUE# "window['environment']['#JSKEY#'] = '#JSVALUE#';" url ${API_URL} http://localhost:8080
scripts.configure:win32: echo. 2>>./.env && . ./.env && javac server/FileEnvironmentConfigurator.java && java server/FileEnvironmentConfigurator.java src/assets/environment.js #JSKEY# #JSVALUE# "window['environment']['#JSKEY#'] = '#JSVALUE#';" url %API_URL% http://localhost:8080
scripts.start:linux: touch ./.env && . ./.env && npm run configure:linux && ng serve --port ${FRONT_SERVER_PORT}
scripts.start:win32: echo. 2>>./.env && . ./.env && npm run configure:win32 && ng serve --port %FRONT_SERVER_PORT%
